Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near Jackson/Loomis
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Loomis, Congress and Racine due to, street blockage near Jackson/Loomis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Loomis, Congress and Racine due to, street blockage near Jackson/Loomis.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
